instruments.name: Snare Drum
instruments.placement: Off-axis, 3 inches from the rim pointing to the center of the drum

instruments.name: Kick Drum
instruments.placement: Pointing directly to the sound hole, experiment with proximity

instruments.name: Acoustic Guitar
instruments.placement: Off-axis to the sound hole, pointing towards it by the middle of the arm

instruments.name: Violin
instruments.placement: 2 to 4 feet above the Violin, point to the center of the instrument from the front

instruments.name: Piano
instruments.placement: Stereo pair, pointing slightly behind the action, treble closer than the bass
